name: Name
passwordResetTokenInfo: Enter the token you received in your email to reset your password
changeYourPasswordDescription: Choose a new password for your account
password_reset_description: Receive email instructions to reset your password.
edit_user_description: Make changes to your user here. Click save when you're done.
accept_terms_description: You agree to the terms and privacy policy.
user_update_error: There was a problem updating your profile.
user_delete_warning:
This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove
your data from our servers.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please contact support if you need further help.
flash_password_update_error: The was a problem resetting your password. Please contact support if you need further help.
flash_incorrect_credentials: The email or password is incorrect.
check_your_email:
Check your email account for a link to reset your password. If it doesnâ€™t appear within
a few minutes, check your spam folder.
password_reset_success_description: You have successfully changed your password.
account_not_found: The email address does not have an account.
password_reset_error: There was a problem resetting your password. Please contact support if you need further help.
emails_verification_email_html:
Please click this link to verify your email address for your {appName} account.

You can also click on the following link.

{verifyEmailURL}

If you did not create this account, you can disregard this email.
emails_password_reset_email_html:
Please click this link to change your password for {appName}.

You can also visit the link below.

{updatePasswordURL}

If you did not request to change your password, you can disregard this email.
emails_email_changed_text: Your {appName} account email has been updated from {oldEmail} to {email}.  If you DID NOT request this change, please contact support at: {baseURL}/ to revert the changes.
emails_email_changed_html:
Your {appName} account email has been updated from {oldEmail} to {email}.

If you DID NOT request this change, please contact support at: {baseURL} to revert the changes.
emails_email_changed_subject: Your email address for {appName} has changed.
emails_welcome_email_html:
Thank you for verifying your email address for {appName}.

You can now log in to your account.
flash_email_cannot_be_verified: Your email could not be verified. Please contact support if you feel this is an error.
flash_email_verification_successful_now_: Je kunt nu hier inloggen
flash_new_verification_email_sent: A new verification email was sent. Please check your email.
confirm_your_email_description:
Check your email to confirm your email address to log in at {appName}. If necessary,
also check your junk mail/spam folder.
flash_account_created_check_email: Account created. Please check your email to verify your account.
flash_email_already_exists: A user with that email already exists.
flash_failed_to_create_account: Account was not able to be created.
